trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when one or more errors occur during composition in a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 개체에서 컴퍼지션 중에 하나 이상의 오류가 발생할 때 throw되는 예외를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> class.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError" /> objects that represent problems during composition.
trans-unit.target: 컴퍼지션 중에 문제를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError" /> 개체 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> class with the specified collection of composition errors.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 컴퍼지션 오류의 컬렉션을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" />을 설명하는 메시지 또는 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 속성을 기본값으로 설정하려면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 오류 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" />을 설명하는 메시지 또는 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 속성을 기본값으로 설정하려면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the underlying cause of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> or <see langword="null" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" />의 근본 원인인 예외 또는 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 속성을 <see langword="null" />로 설정하려면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 오류 메시지와 이 예외의 원인인 예외를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError" /> objects that describe the errors associated with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError" />에 연결된 오류를 설명하는 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError" /> objects that describe the errors associated with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException" />.
Gets a message that describes the exception.
Gets a collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 예외의 초기 소스를 포함하는 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 예외의 초기 소스를 포함하는 컬렉션입니다.
